doc.name: TCPPacketReceiver
doc.description:
This actor receives RecordTokens from a network input port and decomposes the packet into several tokens that are contained within the packet. This actor should used with a PTIDES director and in pairswith the ptolemy.domains.ptides.lib.qm.TCPPacketReceiver, typically with a network fabric model in between.

ptolemy.domains.ptides.lib.qm.TCPPacketReceiver decomposes TCP packets containing PTIDES events.

This actor consumes one input token and creates a stream of output tokens, each with the timestamp specified as a part of the token.
doc.author: Ilge Akkaya
doc.port: The input port, which is a record type.
